com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.options

Class Gradient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.options.Gradient

  • public class Gradient
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
    Represents a gradient for use inside a BoxStyle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Gradient() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Gradient create()
      Default constructor.
      void setColor1(String color1)
      Sets the start color for gradient.
      void setColor2(String color2)
      Sets the finish color for gradient.
      void setUseObjectBoundingBoxUnits(boolean useObjectBoundingBoxUnits)
      If true, the boundary for x1, y1, x2, and y2 is the box.
      If false, it's the entire chart.
      void setX1(String x1)
      Where on the boundary to start and end the color1/color2 gradient.
      This is upper left corner.
      void setX2(String x2)
      Where on the boundary to start and end the color1/color2 gradient.
      This is upper right corner.
      void setY1(String y1)
      Where on the boundary to start and end the color1/color2 gradient.
      This is lower left corner.
      void setY2(String y2)
      Where on the boundary to start and end the color1/color2 gradient.
      This is lower right corner.
